body:
A legendary item with this ability becomes an intelligent magic item (Core Rulebook 523). When this ability is first selected, the legendary item starts with base Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores of 10. The item gains speech as a supernatural ability. It can speak Common plus a number of additional languages based on its Intelligence score. The additional languages can be any that the bonded creature wants, except for secret languages (such as Druidic). The item gains senses with a range of 30 feet. Furthermore, this item always has the alignment of the bonded creature who first selected this ability.

An intelligent legendary item has an Ego score, just like a non-mythic intelligent item, but it can never become dominant in its relationship with its bonded creature as long as the bonded creature's alignment corresponds to the item's (using the normal rules for intelligent items).

This is a persistent ability. An intelligent legendary item gains a +4 bonus to its Ego when interacting with non-mythic wielders.

You can select this ability more than once. Each time you do, you can increase its ability scores (to a maximum of 20 each) and select one of the following special abilities. You can increase all three of its ability scores by 2 points, or one of these ability scores by 4 points and one other ability score by 2 points.

The special abilities are listed below. Some have another ability as a prerequisite.

sections.body: This item can sprout limbs and move with a speed of 10 feet.
sections.name: Animate
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Animate

sections.body: This item gains blindsense with the same range as its other senses. The item must have the darkvision ability to have this ability.
sections.name: Blindsense
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Blindsense

sections.body: This item gains darkvision with the same range as its other senses.
sections.name: Darkvision
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Darkvision

sections.body: The range of this item's senses increases to 60 feet.
sections.name: Expanded Senses (60 ft.)
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Expanded Senses (60 ft.)

sections.body: The range of this item's senses increases to 120 feet. The item must have expanded senses (60 ft.) to have this ability.
sections.name: Expanded Senses (120 ft.)
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Expanded Senses (120 ft.)

sections.body: The item gains a fly speed of 30 feet with average maneuverability. The item must have the animate ability to have this ability.
sections.name: Fly
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Fly

sections.body: This item can read script in any language regardless of its known languages.
sections.name: Read Languages
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Read Languages

sections.body: This item can read magical writing and scrolls as if using read magic. This ability doesn't allow the item to activate scrolls or other spell-completion items. The item can suppress and resume this ability as a free action.
sections.name: Read Magic
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Read Magic

sections.body: The item can change its shape into one other form of the same size.
sections.name: Shape Change
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Shape Change

sections.body: This item gains 10 ranks in one skill. This must be an Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill, unless the item has the animate ability (allowing it to choose Acrobatics) or the fly ability (allowing it to choose Fly).
sections.name: Skill Ranks
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Skill Ranks

sections.body: This item allows its bearer to cast a limited number of spells as spell-like abilities. This ability can be taken more than once. Each time it's taken, the bonded creature gains 5 points to spend on selecting what spells the item can cast. A spell costs a number of points equal to its level (minimum 1). The bearer can then activate the item to use each spell-like ability once per day. By spending double the cost, the bearer can use each spell-like ability three times per day. All spells must come from the same class's spell list. No spell can have a level higher than the bonded creature's tier. The caster level for these spells is equal to double the bonded creature's tier. The save DC for these spells is equal to 10 + the spell level + the bonded creature's tier.
sections.name: Spellcasting
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Spellcasting

sections.body: This item can hold private mental conversations with its bearer, regardless of whether they share a known language. The item must be in physical contact with a creature to communicate this way.
sections.name: Telepathy
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Telepathy

sections.body: Once per day, the item can teleport as the spell. It must have either the spellcasting ability or the fly ability to have this ability.
sections.name: Teleport
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Intelligent/Teleport
